---
title: "Removing parts of a plot created with shape_plot() or forest_plot()"
date: "2022-11-14"
author: "Neil Wright"
---

```{r}
#| include: false
library(ckbplotr)
resultsA <- dplyr::filter(ckbplotr_forest_data, name == "A")
resultsB <- dplyr::filter(ckbplotr_forest_data, name == "B")
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
forest_plot(panels   = list(resultsA, resultsB),
            col.key  = "variable",
            colour   = NA,
            cicolour = "black")
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
forest_plot(panels    = list(resultsA, resultsB),
            col.key   = "variable",
            pointsize = 0)
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
forest_plot(panels   = list(resultsA, resultsB),
            col.key  = "variable",
            colour   = "black",
            cicolour = NA)
```
